properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 7 at 3:43AM EST until February 7 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest and west winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35
kt and seas 4 to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until noon EST today.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY
